mapper.sql: id, name, password, role_id, status, gmt_created, gmt_modified
mapper.select: select u.id as id,u.name as name,u.`password` as `password`,u.status as status, ro.id as role_id,ro.role_name as role_name, ri.url as right_url from crm_user u, crm_role ro, crm_right ri where u.role_id = ro.id and ro.right_id = ri.id and u.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select u.id as id,u.name as name,u.`password` as `password`,u.status as status, ro.role_name as role_name, ri.url as right_url from crm_user u, crm_role ro, crm_right ri where u.role_id = ro.id and ro.right_id = ri.id and ro.id != 1
mapper.insert: insert into crm_user(name, password, role_Id, status, gmt_created, gmt_modified) values(#{name}, #{password}, #{roleId}, #{status}, #{gmtCreated}, #{gmtModified})
